name: Resume
body:
# Nischal HP

> nischal.hp@gmail.com | +91 9980513359   
> Github / Twitter: nischalhp

## Interests

* Big Data
* Text Analytics
* Data Mining
* Machine Learning
* Databases
* Visualizations
* Open Source

## Professional Experience

### Software Engineer

> SAP Labs India Pvt. Ltd. (Jan 2013 - Present)

* **Backend Developer**
    * Worked on building an Algorithmic Trading platform on SAP's In-Memory database - HANA in which I handled the backend operations .
    * Involved with architecting the schema and building out the core business logic as Stored procedures
    * Built multiple data collection frameworks to obtain data from various sources
    * Helped with various experiments to analyze performance of our platform leading to interesting visualizations

* **Text Analytics Research**
    * Helped with setting up the initial Text Analytics pipeline   
    * Carried out various experiments in the areas of Intention Mining, TF-IDF, Custom Dictionaries
    
* **Operations & Infrastructure**
    * Setup heartbeat based monitoring to various systems
    * Helped architect the cloud offering of the Algorithmic Trading Platform
    
**Technologies**: SAP HANA, Java, SQL, R, Shell scripts, Python

**Frameworks**: Apache JMeter, Jasmine on SAP HANA
    
### Software Engineering Intern

> SAP Labs India Pvt. Ltd. (Aug 2010 - Dec 2013)    

* **Research Intern**
    * Was part of the research team that ideated the Algorithmic trading platform
    * Worked with understanding chart patterns and implementing them
    * Developed Technical Indicators
    * Helped with an experiment to analyze sentiments on twitter data and correlate it with the stock data
    * Started building initial versions of the data collection frameworks

* **ABAP Developer & Tester**
    * Worked with WebDynPro to build regression testing tools for internal SAP use and develop new features to already existing SAP components
    
**Technologies**: SAP HANA, ABAP WebDynPro, SQL, Java, R, L
    
## Projects

### MS Project

* **TweetLyze**
    * Developed a data extraction framework for twitter.
    * Built a summarizer for twitter trends to help understand trends better and to bring out a relationship between these trends
    * **Technologies**: Java, Python+Flask, PostgreSQL, HTML5, CSS3, JS, D3, Twitter Bootstrap
    
### Side Projects

* **Feedlyze**
    * A visualization tool to help analyze feedbacks from a Google Spreadsheet based on Text Analytics practices.
    * **Technologies**: Python+Flask, NLTK, AngularJS, D3, Twitter Bootstrap
    
* **Project-Gnom**
    * A complete solution to enable restaurants to go mobile with their order taking, billing and inventory management.
    * **Technologies**: Java+Restlets, MySQL, Android, AngularJS, Twitter Bootstrap 
    
* **TickDoc**
    * A doxygen clone for SAP HANA Procedures
    * Along with diplaying documentation, this tool also helped visualize the dependency of one procedures on others.
    * **Technologies**: Python+Flask, HTML5, CSS3, JS, D3, Twitter Bootstrap
    
* **Relief.io**
    * A disaster management tool to connect victims with on-site and off-site relief workes using twitter
    * Helped with architecting the initial infrastructure on rackspace and with the initial mockups of the tool
    * **Technologies**: Nginx, MySQL, MongoDB, NodeJS 

## Achievements

* Speaker at various internal and external SAP events like DCODE
* Handled trainings at SAP on topics like SAP ABAP WebDynPro
* Winner of Startup Weekend Bangalore 2012 (3rd place)
* Active participant at various Hackathons and Technology Conferences

## Technologies

* **UI**: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript
* **Backend**: Java, Python
* **Databases**: PostgreSQL, MongoDB, SAP HANA, MySQL
* **OS**: Nix, Windows
* **Statistical tools**: R

## Educational Qualifications

* **MS, Bits Pilani** | 8 CGPA
* **BCA, National College Jayanagar, Bangalore** | 84% Aggregate
